segments.text: I feel a wave of concern washing over me as I watch this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems so focused on her chore, almost lost in thought.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea what is about to befall her quiet kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It must be truly awful to realize your sink has flooded everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children, they're so small and eager for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool looks like it's going to collapse at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get hurt or seriously injure themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It breaks my heart a little to see such potential for accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle of water is growing, making the floor so slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into a really bad morning for everyone involved.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wish someone would notice and intervene, before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Perhaps a sudden sound will break the spell of unawareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I sincerely hope everyone comes out of this unscathed.
segments.speaker: PAR
